It all begins with an idea.

Embarking on my journey as a professional dancer, I received training at the esteemed Laine Theatre Arts School in London. This paved the way for captivating performances aboard various cruise ships in Australia, allowing me to traverse the globe as a dance captain and cast manager. While I cherished my time at sea, I felt a calling for a new chapter in my life. Driven by a passion for fitness and well-being, I transitioned my focus to Pilates, turning my love for this practice into a fulfilling profession. Upon becoming a certified Pilates Instructor, I established my own venture, Black Rock Pilates & Yoga, where I've dedicated myself to empowering others through movement and mindfulness. Embracing the digital landscape, I expanded my reach by offering online classes, fostering connections with individuals worldwide who share my enthusiasm for Pilates and Yoga. This journey has been transformative, reaffirming my commitment to guiding others along their wellness path. Today, based in the serene environs of the New Forest, I lead weekly group and private classes, aspiring to curate wellness retreats abroad and further expand my brand to touch the lives of many, regardless of their experience level or background.
